description.value:
Multiple Resources:
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm * [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm * [Person](person.html): A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm * [Patient](patient.html): A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm
